result.eng: There is a picture of you on the cover of the magazine.
result.ga: Tá pictiúr díot ar chlúdach na hirise
result.orig: Tá pictiúr díot ar chlúdach na hirise
result.html: Tá pictiúr díot ar chlúdach na hiriseThere is a picture of you on the cover of the magazine.
result.ponchtml: Tá pictiúr díot ar ċlúdaċ na hiriseThere is a picture of you on the cover of the magazine.

result.html: Bain díot do chótaTake off your coat.
result.ponchtml: Bain díot do ċótaTake off your coat.

result.eng: She will cut your head off if she sees you!
result.ga: Bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thú
result.orig: Bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thú
result.html: Bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thúShe will cut your head off if she sees you!
result.ponchtml: Bainfiḋ sí an ceann díot má ḟeiceann sí ṫúShe will cut your head off if she sees you!

result.eng: We will be hugely thankful to you.
result.ga: Beidh muid thar a bheith buíoch díot
result.orig: Beidh muid thar a bheith buíoch díot
result.html: Beidh muid thar a bheith buíoch díotWe will be hugely thankful to you.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ muid ṫar a ḃeiṫ buíoċ díotWe will be hugely thankful to you.

result.eng: I am grateful to you for it.
result.ga: Tá mé buíoch díot as sin
result.orig: Tá mé buíoch díot as sin
result.html: Tá mé buíoch díot as sinI am grateful to you for it.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé buíoċ díot as sinI am grateful to you for it.

result.html: Bain díot do chaipínTake off your hat.
result.ponchtml: Bain díot do ċaipínTake off your hat.

result.html: Bain díot do chuid éadaíTake off your clothes.
result.ponchtml: Bain díot do ċuid éadaíTake off your clothes.

result.html: Bain díot do sheaicéadTake off your jacket.
result.ponchtml: Bain díot do ẛeaicéadTake off your jacket.

result.eng: Well, you'll be made a saint one day!
result.ga: Muise déanfar naomh díot go fóill
result.orig: Muise déanfar naomh díot go fóill
result.html: Muise déanfar naomh díot go fóillWell, you'll be made a saint one day!
result.ponchtml: Muise déanfar naoṁ díot go fóillWell, you'll be made a saint one day!

result.eng: You could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.
result.ga: Thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne tú
result.orig: Thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne tú
result.html: Thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne túYou could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.
result.ponchtml: Ṫiocfaḋ leat a ċur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne túYou could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.
